name: Pre-Construction
Build area/work face
Subcontractor has been reviewed and accepts area handed over to them from Main Contractor
Insulated panel had been inspected and is free from damage
Base build - Base components and ceiling supports
Concrete slab has been sweeped clean
Concrete nib is level and straight
Set out of room is as per drawings
Set out of doors and openings have completed and are as per drawings
Structural steel is true and plumb
Ceiling supports have been installed correctly
Base channel has been siliconed sealed and fixed at correct centres
Angles (to form channel) have been silicone bed sealed and fixed at correct centres
All third party services have been installed and are ready for panel installation to commence
Project Manager to sign off
Main build - Insulated panel installation
Insulated panel has been inspected and is free from damage ready to install
Base channel/angles have been siliconed bed sealed, ready for panel installation to commence
Insulated panel has been installed plumb
Corners have been formed neat and tidy
Mid-span fixings have been installed at the correct height and centers as per specifications
Perimeter angles have been installed neat and tidy with correct fixings and centers
Main build - Penetrations
Doors sizes have been marked out correctly
Window sizes have been marked out correctly
Penetrations have been marked out correctly
Fire sprinklers have been marked out correctly
Project Manager to sign off
Completed works
Internal panels surfaces have been inspected and no damage has been found
All interior angles/flashings have been installed correctly and all fixings have been fitted
Ceiling panels have been inspected and no damage has been found
Ceiling panel fixings have been installed correctly and all fixings are at the correct centers
All windows have been fitted and all fixings have been fitted
All doors have been fitted and all fixings have been fitted
All Sealant work has been completed and is neat and tidy
All penetrations have been cut, flashed and siliconed sealed
All external angles/flashings have been installed correctly and all fixings have been fitted
External panels surfaces have been inspected and no damage has been found
Recorded damage
Panel damage (during installation) has been identified and reported to main contractor
Panel damage (after installation) has been identified and reported to main contractor
Panel damage has been repaired and evidence of such recorded with main contractor
Variation to contract
Variation has been requested by main contractor
Project Manager to approve
Variation has been completed
Project Manager to sign off
